verses.verse: Thus the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H3619>me<s%>: and, behold, a basket of summer <S%H7019>fruit<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5986>Amos<s%>, what <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H559>thou<s%>? And I said, A <S%H3619>basket<s%> of summer <S%H7019>fruit<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H7093>me<s%>, The end is <S%H935>come<s%> upon my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> pass by them any <S%H5674>more<s%>.

And the <S%H7892>songs<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> shall be <S%H3213>wailings<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> shall be <S%H7227>many<s%>: in every <S%H4725>place<s%> shall they cast them <S%H7993>forth<s%> with <S%H2013>silence<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H7602>this<s%>, O ye that would swallow up the <S%H34>needy<s%>, and <S%H7673>cause<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7673>fail<s%>,

saying <S%H559><s%>, When will the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> be <S%H5674>gone<s%>, that we may <S%H7666>sell<s%> <S%H7668>grain<s%>? and the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, that we may set <S%H6605>forth<s%> <S%H1250>wheat<s%>, making the <S%H374>ephah<s%> <S%H6994>small<s%>, and the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>, and dealing <S%H5791>falsely<s%> with <S%H3976>balances<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%>;

that we may <S%H7069>buy<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> for <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H34>needy<s%> for a pair of <S%H5275>shoes<s%>, and <S%H7666>sell<s%> the <S%H4651>refuse<s%> of the <S%H1250>wheat<s%>?
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, Surely I will <S%H5331>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> any of their <S%H4639>works<s%>.

Shall not the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7264>tremble<s%> for <S%H56>this<s%>, and every one mourn that <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H5927>therein<s%>? yea, it shall rise up wholly like the <S%H2975>River<s%>; and it shall be <S%H1644>troubled<s%> and <S%H8257>sink<s%> <S%H216>again<s%>, like the River of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>, that I will cause the <S%H8121>sun<s%> to go <S%H935>down<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>, and I will <S%H2821>darken<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H216>clear<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And I will <S%H2015>turn<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts<s%> into <S%H60>mourning<s%>, and all your <S%H7892>songs<s%> into <S%H7015>lamentation<s%>; and I will <S%H5927>bring<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> upon all <S%H4975>loins<s%>, and <S%H7144>baldness<s%> upon every <S%H7218>head<s%>; and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it as the <S%H60>mourning<s%> for an <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H319>son<s%>, and the end thereof as a <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>, that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, not a <S%H7458>famine<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor a <S%H6772>thirst<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%>, but of <S%H8085>hearing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they shall <S%H5128>wander<s%> from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and from the <S%H6828>north<s%> even to the <S%H4217>east<s%>; they shall run to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and shall not find <S%H4672>it<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and the young <S%H970>men<s%> <S%H5968>faint<s%> for <S%H6772>thirst<s%>.

They that <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H819>sin<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, As thy <S%H430>god<s%>, O <S%H1835>Dan<s%>, <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; <S%H1870>and<s%>, As the way of <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and never rise up <S%H6965>again<s%>.
